title: Anker intros new 10,000mAh MagSafe Power Bank with 20W USB-C charging
content:
Today, Anker is expanding its lineup of MagSafe-compatible accessories with the debut of a new and even more capable power bank. Packing a 10,000mAh battery into the portable battery form-factor we’ve seen in the past, the new Anker MagSafe offering is the brand’s most capable solution yet. Offering a 7.5W MagSafe pad, there’s also 20W USB-C charging and more.

more…

The post Anker intros new 10,000mAh MagSafe Power Bank with 20W USB-C charging appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Anker MagSafe 10000mAh Battery arrives with double the capacity as previous models alongside an integrated kickstand.
